sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Apple ( AAPL ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 3.0%.
Year to date, Apple registers a 6.1% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.5%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 19.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are UnitedHealth Group ( UNH ), trading down 0.4%, and Chevron ( CVX ), trading up 1.5% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
